sys_ux_client_script.name: setActiveSidebarTab

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_b73d7eb94748f110f61b4c6d826d430f
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">4b3d3eb94748f110f61b4c6d826d4300</macroponent><name>setActiveSidebarTab</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const { name } = event.payload;
    const { sidebarActiveTab } = api.state;
    if (name != sidebarActiveTab) {
        api.setState("sidebarActiveTab", name);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-16 08:32:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>b73d7eb94748f110f61b4c6d826d430f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setActiveSidebarTab</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_b73d7eb94748f110f61b4c6d826d430f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-16 08:32:43</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
